intro: Step into a world of mystery and deception as you unravel the truth behind Marchand’s murder.
description:
Agatha Hastings came to Silver Peaks for a peaceful getaway, but instead, she walked into a nightmare. 
When Victor Marchand, a wealthy businessman, is found dead in his room, panic spreads through the secluded ski resort. 
A brutal snowstorm has buried all roads under deep drifts of snow, sealing the guests inside. 
No one can leave. No one can arrive. And the killer is among them.

Search through 140 immersive clutter puzzles, hunting for hidden objects in chaotic scenes. 
For the most patient and observant players, 20 additional puzzle challenges await, testing your wit and attention to detail. 
But be warned—every clue you uncover brings you closer to the truth… and closer to the danger lurking in the shadows.

In Mirrors of Deception: The Silver Peaks Secret, nothing is as it seems. 
Can you solve the mystery before the killer strikes again... or will you be next?
